Reviews.Title: “Perfect Little Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Hobitant
Reviews.Content: For starters, this isn't a posh, four-star establishment, but it doesn't try to be. Wanting to give my girlfriend a night of fun before she headed oversees (but not having much in the way of funds), the Jacuzzi rooms caught my attention. I called late Saturday afternoon and a friendly voice said they'd hold a room for me. I checked in, $100/night (tax included) with a $50 deposit. They didn't require a credit card, just a valid drivers license. The room was a bit dated but very clean - you could even smell the remnants of the cleaning products (which was easily aired out). Long story short: we had such a good time that we woke up the next day and paid for another night. Now we have a weekend full of memories neither of us will forget!

Reviews.Title: “the grand motel is great”
Reviews.Author: cajun44
Reviews.Content: i have been staying here at the grand motel for 4 weeks now,im on a vacation from belfast northern ireland and i think the motel lives up to mits name it is grand in every way friendley manager and very helpfull the rest of the staff cleaning ladies are very efficent at there job and also very friendly i will defnitley return here again on my next visit to toronto i would defnitley recomend the grand motel to all my friends and to every one else who will be looking for somewhere to stay in torontp the best of irish luck to the manager allister and his wife from frank mcclinton room 26

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Anik55
Reviews.Content: It was 770$ (tax included) for two rooms for a week. The rooms were clean, also was the swimming pool. We had a small (very small!) fridge and a microwave, so we were able to cook our own food. We also brought with us a smal oven for the same reason. The motel was at half an hour drive from every attraction. We recommand this motel for a cheap and nice stay in Toronto.

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon”
Reviews.Author: en33nch
Reviews.Content: Great cheap motel really close to the center of Toronto

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: JimmyLaw77
Reviews.Content: Very clean place. Nice swimming pool. Pleasant staff. Close to highways into Toronto. Very well-kept.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and rate!”
Reviews.Author: Jenn1415
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking for a place where we could stay for the night that wasn't too expensive. Once we arrived at the Grand Motel we were very surprised! Our room was clean and was fully equipped with a T.V, microwave and mini fridge. The beds were very comfortable. Our bathroom was small but that didn't bother us. Nearby there are banks, grocery stores and restaurants. If you show your CAA/ AAA card you receive a discount! I recommend this motel for people who are looking for a place to stay in a quiet area at a reasonable price. I will defiantly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A great place at a great price in a nice quiet area. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: ruddrudd
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this motel every time I visit Toronto. It is a great motel for the price. Very clean and quiet. Me and my girlfriend stay here for two weeks at a time, twice a year. I have not found anything better for the price and location. If you don't mind long transit rides to get into downtown Toronto, which takes roughly forty five minutes, then this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “The nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: kulinich88
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Grand motel for a couple of days in August.The place was neat and the price was reasonable. The motel is not new, but well maintained. I liked the outdoor pool and a fish pond the most. The staff was friendly and my stay was very comfortable.There is a chinese food restaurant next door to the motel. I will definitely recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: “best weekly deal!”
Reviews.Author: Janvan82
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Grand Motel for one week this December. It was the best weekly deal for a clean, nice place. The place was a bit removed from the centre of the city but the price matched the location. The best part was that I was able to cook my own food inside the room and saved money by not eating out.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent room & reasonable rate”
Reviews.Author: Rick65
Reviews.Content: We were traveling by car from Montreal to Toronto on November19, 2007 and came to the Grand Motel without a reservation. I asked to see the room before making a decision to stay. I was surprised to find the hotel style room in the motel and for such price. I needed non-smoking room and I got it. We paid for one night because we planned to stay next 2 days in Toronto downtown. In the morning we decided do not waste our time to look for another motel in the downtown. We paid for the next 2 nights. The room was clean, quiet and well kept. Special thanks for great mattresses. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Motel Toronto
HotelInfo.Address: 4626 Kingston Road, Toronto, Ontario M1E 2P6, Canada
